meanings.definition: To act or behave toward someone in a certain way.
meanings.sent1: She was treating her friend kindly.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys treating others with respect.
meanings.sent3: The cat was treating the mouse like a tiny king.
meanings.sent4: The sun was treating the flowers to its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: Treating others with kindness is always a good choice.

meanings.definition: To handle, deal with, or use in a specified way.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic was treating the car gently.
meanings.sent2: She treats her books carefully, never bending the pages.
meanings.sent3: The robot was treating the fragile vase as if it were made of gold.
meanings.sent4: Time was treating his wounds with its healing touch.
meanings.sent5: Treating delicate items with care is important to avoid accidents.

meanings.definition: To provide someone with food, drink, or entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The host was treating the guests to a delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: She loves treating herself to a movie night every Friday.
meanings.sent3: The clown was treating the audience to a show full of laughter.
meanings.sent4: The ocean was treating the beach with its calming waves.
meanings.sent5: Treating friends to a fun time creates lasting memories.
